text.div:
Emotional well being assessed

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    48512-8 Are you basically satisfied with your life [GDS]
    48513-6 Have you dropped many of your activities and interests [GDS]
    48514-4 Do you feel that your life is empty [GDS]
    48515-1 Do you often get bored [GDS]
    48516-9 Are you hopeful about the future [GDS]
    48517-7 Are you bothered by thoughts you cannot get out of your head [GDS]
    48518-5 Are you in good spirits most of the time [GDS]
    48519-3 Are you afraid that something bad is going to happen to you [GDS]
    48520-1 Do you feel happy most of the time [GDS]
    48521-9 Do you often feel helpless [GDS]
    48522-7 Do you often get restless and fidgety [GDS]
    48523-5 Do you prefer to stay at home, rather than going out and doing new things [GDS]
    48524-3 Do you frequently worry about the future [GDS]
    48525-0 Do you feel you have more problems with memory than most [GDS]
    48526-8 Do you think it is wonderful to be alive now [GDS]
    48527-6 Do you often feel downhearted and blue [GDS]
    48528-4 Do you feel pretty worthless the way you are now [GDS]
    48529-2 Do you worry a lot about the past [GDS]
    48530-0 Do you find life very exciting [GDS]
    48531-8 Is it hard for you to get started on new projects [GDS]
    48532-6 Do you feel full of energy [GDS]
    48533-4 Do you feel that your situation is hopeless [GDS]
    48534-2 Do you think that most people are better off than you are [GDS]
    48535-9 Do you frequently get upset over little things [GDS]
    48536-7 Do you frequently feel like crying [GDS]
    48537-5 Do you have trouble concentrating [GDS]
    48538-3 Do you enjoy getting up in the morning [GDS]
    48539-1 Do you prefer to avoid social gatherings [GDS]
    48540-9 Is it easy for you to make decisions [GDS]
    48541-7 Is your mind as clear as it used to be [GDS]

name: Emotional well being assessed
publisher: American Society of Clinical Oncology Steward
